application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x London plane (T194): Remove rubbing limb on east side which is rubbing on upper side of larger limb beneath it at approximately 16 m.1 x London plane (T730):  Reduce heavy branch weight of limb on south east side, which has bark wound/decay/woodpecker hole on north side, back to most recent reduction points. 1 x London plane (T743): Remove limb with Massaria, roughly 170mm in diameter, as shown on photo 2 of Massaria inspection report of 09/07/20. 1 x London plane (T769):  Remove first large limb facing north with early signs of Massaria.
decision_conditions: work in accordance with British Standard
